definition: bottom tip of the heart/fig. innermost feelings/coll. my darling

sentences.english: Aex beat enlargement and left-downward displacement.
sentences.chinese: 心尖搏動範圍擴大，向左下移位。

sentences.english: It is loudest at the apex and may be accentuated by placing the patient in the left lateral decubitus position.
sentences.chinese: 心尖部位最響亮，病人處左側臥位時聽得最清楚。

sentences.english: The typical sign was audible click and systolic murmur in cardiac apex.
sentences.chinese: 典型體徵爲心尖區聞及喀喇音和收縮期雜音。

sentences.english: The heart points towards Wotton Hill, where Janet is from.
sentences.chinese: 心尖指向沃頓山，那裏是珍妮特的故鄉。

sentences.english: Faint aroma, rippling over the apex.
sentences.chinese: 淡淡的香氣，盪漾在心尖之上。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the vectorcardiogram characteristics of the patients with apical hypertrophic cardiomyopathy confirmed through clinical diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索心尖肥厚型心肌病的心電向量圖特點。

sentences.english: Easily make me to scream from my heart tip.
sentences.chinese: 從容的讓我從心尖上發出尖叫。

sentences.english: S3 . The third heart sound (S3, or ventricular gallop) is low-pitched and best heard at the apex with the stethoscope bell.
sentences.chinese: 低音調，用鍾式聽診器在心尖處聽得最清楚。

sentences.english: The site of cardiac rupture was more frequenfly located in anterior wall near the apex.
sentences.chinese: 心臟破裂部位以前壁近心尖處多見。

sentences.english: Keep me in Ur heart again.
sentences.chinese: 請把我再次留駐在你心尖。

sentences.english: And so to you from the bottom of my heart, I wanna say one thing. Thank you.
sentences.chinese: 對於站在我心尖上的你，我只要說一句話，謝謝你。

definition: heart (as the seat of emotions)/cardiac atrium
pit of the stomach/solar plexus/words and thoughts
in the depth of one's soul
to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
